Perceptor:

Perceptor poped up near Kitkat and shut down the distress signal "i 
don't like that any one alse comes, it could be an unpleasant 
company"

and tooking at Kitkat in arms, he walked towards predacons' base.

Looking to the femme, he said "Do you have a name?"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679 <raccoon7679@y...>" 
<raccoon7679@y...> wrote:
> KitKat::
> 
> Her long forgotten body lay under the earth, rust and rubble from 
> wars of a bygone age.  Her body and her spark lay there, thought 
to 
> be lost somewhere in time.  But her spark was not to be 
forgotten.  
> Her optics fluttered and flashed as her spark was awakening 
again.  
> The exposed wires in her shoulder sparked as her body lay there.  
> Her hand moved.  Her body shuttered and she cried out from under 
the 
> rubble.  Her body resisted at first. But with the sheer will to 
> live, she started to make her way back up to the earth's surface.  
> Her hand broke ground and she could feel air movement.  Her optics 
> saw the sun and she screemed out at seeing the sun for the first 
> time in ages.  She climed up and stood on her feet once again.  
> Then, with a pained cry, she fell to her hands and knees.  Her 
body 
> covered in rust. Only patches of dull black were the only hint of 
> her once glistening black body.    She fell and laid on the 
ground, 
> trembling.  Her power level was extremely low and would not last 
> long.  She opened her forearm compartment and activated a general 
> distress signal.  She prayed that somebot would find her in time.  
> Her insignia had rusted off.  Her should was still sparking from 
the 
> exposed wires.  She looked like the pit and felt like it too.  She 
> didn't even think she had enough energy to transform into wolf 
> mode.  She only hoped she would be found in time.
